评论概述: I COULD WALTZ ACROSS TEXAS IN THIS !!
评论详情: For Reference, I am 5'4", 96 lbs & 36B (On a good day, LOL) After reading the Reviews, I decided to order a size Large & BOY, am I glad I did !!  Even the Size Large, fit more like a medium. Normally, I usually order a Size Small OR Medium, depending on the style.  But, in the case of this shirt (White) I ordered a Large. As I said, I'm REALLY glad I did.  I ordered it today, about 1600 (4PM) and I just received it, two & a half hours later. It has a really nice, almost silky feel to it. Also, it is "Fitted", which I don't remember reading that. But it is.  I do NOT like ANY of my clothes to fit snugly on me, which is why I usually order things in size Medium, but I am REALLY glad I ordered this in Large. So, I would order up a size or two, if you have a large chest. Or if you do not like snug-fitting shirts. It is REALLY VERY nice & I just ordered it again, in Large & in Blue. It REALLY is that nice & VERY reasonable.  THANKS, AMAZON !!
I love this blouse, I have long arms & the sleeves went all the way down to my wrists which is what I wanted. The size chart was accurate.

I'm a server in a restaurant and we are required to wear white long sleeve button-down shirts. This fits great, doesn't wrinkle easy, and is lightweight so I don't get too hot. I do wear a cami under it because it is slightly see through. Great length, can be tucked in or wear out.
Love the quality and feel of the fabric. Bought my usual size but doesn't fit. Runs small.
